events.message: The applicant submitted a personal loan application intending to cover medical expenses incurred recently.
The loan application has been categorised under Personal Loan due to keywords related to medical costs in the request.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to manage the applicant's case and guide them through the approval process.
The loan officer conducted the initial review of the application, verifying the applicant’s stated purpose and basic eligibility.
Additional documentation was requested from the applicant, including medical bills and proof of income to support loan approval.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, including detailed medical statements and recent pay stubs for income verification.
The credit check was performed on the applicant’s financial history, revealing a generally healthy credit score with minor past delays.
Risk assessment was completed, considering the applicant's credit profile and purpose of the loan; risk is assessed as moderate.
A loan offer was presented to the applicant detailing the interest rate, repayment terms, and total payable amount with clarity.
The applicant provided positive feedback on the loan offer, asking for clarification on early repayment policies.
Application was escalated to the senior underwriting team for further review based on specific terms requested by the applicant.
The loan was officially approved by the senior underwriters following a detailed assessment and final approval committee decision.
Funds were successfully transferred to the applicant’s bank account enabling timely access to cover the required medical expenses.
Follow-up communication was conducted to confirm the applicant’s satisfaction with the loan disbursement and repayment schedule.
The application process has been formally closed after the successful funding and initial post-approval follow-up.
